dreft.description: A highly prestigious laundry detergent brand in Belgium and the Netherlands.
dreft.fullDescription: Dreft was first launched in Belgium in 1948 and in the Netherlands in 1957, quickly becoming an iconic and historic brand in both countries. Renowned for its trustworthiness, Dreft is regarded by consumers as 'the safest detergent for clothes,' with the slogan, 'Nothing is safer than Dreft.' As a total care brand, it provides safe, effective solutions for all types of clothing, including colors, delicates, and more. Recently, Dreft has expanded into the Nordic countries with its Dreft 0% variant, which is free from fragrances and colorants. This version carries the endorsement of Nordic Swan and the Asthma and Allergy Foundation, reflecting its commitment to safety and sustainability.

daz.description: One of the UK's most iconic brands in laundry care, known for brilliant whiteness and exceptional freshness.
daz.fullDescription: Since 1953, DAZ has been a well-loved UK brand, trusted for its effective laundry care and its iconic red packaging. Known for delivering brilliant whiteness and exceptional freshness, DAZ ensures clothes look their best and smell delightful. With decades of experience, DAZ simplifies laundry routines, making everyday life easier and more enjoyable for its users.

a-plus.description: A brand synonymous with innovation and exceptional effectiveness across Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland, and Portugal.
a-plus.fullDescription: A+ is committed to creating the best detergent for both your clothes and the environment. We have invested significantly in developing a product that delivers superior cleaning power while minimizing environmental impact. In the Nordic countries, A+ proudly carries the Nordic Swan and Asthma and Allergy labels, demonstrating our commitment to sustainability and consumer health. In Portugal, where fragrances play a key role for consumers, we offer an extensive range of extraordinary scents in our detergents. Recently, we also launched a line of fabric softeners and scent boosters, providing a full spectrum of fragrance options that cater to the preferences of the Portuguese market. In line with our sustainability goals, A+ uses 100% recyclable packaging and offers refill bags that contain 76% less plastic than traditional bottles, reinforcing our dedication to reducing plastic waste and promoting eco-friendly solutions.

lavandera.description: Our Spanish brand is a specialist in cleaning and caring for clothes and homes, blending efficiency and tradition with exceptional fragrances.
lavandera.fullDescription: La Lavandera by BlueSun is our Spanish brand, a specialist in cleaning and caring for clothes and homes. It blends efficiency and tradition with an exceptional range of fragrances. The brand offers a comprehensive range of products for complete home and laundry care and has been successfully launched in several Eastern European countries, including Romania and Ukraine, where it has quickly gained popularity. La Antigua Lavandera ensures your clothes and your home are cleaned and cared for with the same level of efficiency as always.

gama.description: The smart choice for households worldwide, with a presence in over 20 countries.
gama.fullDescription: Gama is our most international brand, with a presence in over 20 countries. Recognized as the smart choice for those seeking quality, reliability, and convenience in laundry care, Gama continues to expand its range of fragrances and formats to meet the needs of even the most discerning consumers. By adapting to the diverse preferences of global markets, Gama delivers value and convenience to families around the world.

tinokleen.description: An iconic baby care laundry detergent, specially designed to care for the delicate skin of babies while providing gentle yet effective cleaning.
tinokleen.fullDescription: Tinokleen is an iconic baby care laundry detergent, specially designed to care for the delicate skin of babies while providing gentle yet effective cleaning for mums. The brand focuses on safety and gentleness, ensuring that baby clothes are cleaned thoroughly without harsh chemicals that could irritate sensitive skin.

ambipur.description: Brings a breath of fresh air to your home, combining powerful cleaning performance with delightful botanical fragrances.
ambipur.fullDescription: Ambipur brings a breath of fresh air to your WC, combining powerful cleaning performance with delightful botanical fragrances. With advanced formulas, Ambipur guarantees hygienic cleanliness and long-lasting freshness. Using innovative anti-odor technology and natural essential oils, it offers a variety of scents that bring the essence of nature indoors, all in increasingly sustainable packaging.

noora.description: Northern European countries enjoy the fresh fragrances of Noora fabric softeners.
noora.fullDescription: Northern European countries enjoy the fresh fragrances of Noora. These softeners not only safeguard clothes and fabrics but also infuse them with a long-lasting, delightful freshness. Noora offers a broad range of fabric softeners across the Nordic countries, providing consumers with quality care for their textiles.

opso.description: The ultimate air freshener brand for those seeking a more eco-friendly approach to home care.
opso.fullDescription: Immerse yourself in the captivating fragrances of the world's most majestic forests. Crafted with natural tree resin from Mediterranean pine trees, Öpso replaces artificial ingredients with sustainable alternatives. Öpso is the ultimate air freshener brand for those seeking a more eco-friendly approach to home care, with ingredients and packaging designed to minimize environmental impact, support sustainable forestry, and empower local communities.

lang.description: A smart choice and good for everyday cleaning, highly recognized for high-quality powder products.
lang.fullDescription: A smart choice and good for everyday cleaning. While currently expanding its portfolio, it remains highly recognized for its high-quality powder products. A trusted brand for freshness and cleaning performance, it's the go-to solution for Egyptian families seeking the best value for money. Available in 5Kg and 8Kg formats, Lang provides value for families.

coca-cola.description: One of the world's most recognized beverage brands, known for quality and global presence.
coca-cola.fullDescription: Coca-Cola is one of the world's most recognized and valuable brands, with a presence in over 200 countries. Known for its iconic taste and quality, Coca-Cola has been a trusted partner in the beverage industry for over a century.

colgate.description: A leading global oral care brand trusted by millions of families worldwide.
colgate.fullDescription: Colgate is a leading global oral care brand with a strong presence in over 200 countries. The brand is committed to improving oral health and hygiene, offering a wide range of toothpaste, toothbrushes, and oral care products trusted by millions of families worldwide.

dr-pepper.description: A unique and distinctive soft drink brand with a one-of-a-kind flavor profile.
dr-pepper.fullDescription: Dr Pepper is a unique soft drink brand known for its distinctive flavor that combines 23 flavors. With a rich history spanning over a century, Dr Pepper has become a beloved beverage choice in many markets around the world.

fanta.description: A vibrant and refreshing fruit-flavored soft drink brand enjoyed worldwide.
fanta.fullDescription: Fanta is a vibrant fruit-flavored soft drink brand that offers a refreshing taste experience. With a wide variety of flavors available in different markets, Fanta has become a popular choice for consumers seeking a fruity and refreshing beverage option.

garnier.description: A leading beauty and personal care brand offering natural and innovative beauty solutions.
garnier.fullDescription: Garnier is a leading beauty and personal care brand that combines natural ingredients with innovative formulas. The brand offers a comprehensive range of hair care, skin care, and beauty products, focusing on natural beauty solutions that are accessible to everyone.

loreal.description: The world's leading beauty company, offering innovative beauty and personal care products.
loreal.fullDescription: L'Oréal is the world's leading beauty company, with a portfolio of brands that cater to diverse beauty needs. The company is committed to innovation, research, and development, offering high-quality beauty and personal care products that are available worldwide.

nivea.description: A trusted skincare brand known for quality and care, with products for the whole family.
nivea.fullDescription: Nivea is a trusted skincare brand that has been caring for skin for over a century. Known for its quality and gentle formulations, Nivea offers a wide range of skincare products suitable for the whole family, from daily moisturizers to specialized care solutions.

prime.description: A modern hydration and energy drink brand designed for active lifestyles.
prime.fullDescription: Prime is a modern beverage brand that offers hydration and energy drinks designed for active lifestyles. The brand focuses on providing quality hydration solutions with innovative formulations that cater to health-conscious consumers.

toblerone.description: An iconic Swiss chocolate brand known for its distinctive triangular shape and quality.
toblerone.fullDescription: Toblerone is an iconic Swiss chocolate brand recognized worldwide for its distinctive triangular shape and high-quality Swiss chocolate. With a rich heritage dating back over a century, Toblerone has become a symbol of Swiss chocolate excellence.

dove.description: A personal care brand committed to real beauty and gentle, moisturizing products.
dove.fullDescription: Dove is a personal care brand committed to real beauty and providing gentle, moisturizing products. The brand is known for its commitment to body positivity and offers a wide range of personal care products including soaps, body washes, and skincare items that are gentle on the skin.

evian.description: Premium natural spring water sourced from the French Alps, known for purity and quality.
evian.fullDescription: Evian is a premium natural spring water brand sourced from the French Alps. Known for its purity and natural mineral composition, Evian has become a symbol of premium hydration, trusted by consumers worldwide for its quality and taste.

Footer.copyright: © {year} Atik Import Export. All Rights Reserved. Your Partner in Global Trade.

legal.privacyDescription: We protect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. We collect only what we need to provide services and improve your experience. We don't share your data with third parties without your consent, except when required by law. We use strong security measures to protect your information. For privacy questions, contact us at info@atikexp.com.
legal.termsDescription: Using our services means you agree to these terms. We provide international transportation and trade services. We focus on reliability and quality. Our services follow applicable laws and regulations. We may modify these terms and will notify you of significant changes. For details about service terms, shipping conditions, and liability limits, contact us at info@atikexp.com.
legal.sitemapDescription: Find information about our international transportation and trade services. The site includes services, about us, contact information, and more. Use the navigation menu or footer links to explore.

Metadata.title: Atik Import Export – Global Trade & Transportation for Cleaning and Care Products
Metadata.description: Atik Import Export connects global markets through reliable international transportation and specialized solutions for cleaning and care products. Your partner for global trade.
Metadata.keywords: Atik Import Export, international trade, international transportation, cleaning products, care products, import export, truck transportation, global supply chain, Istanbul trade, Warsaw trade, Tehran trade

Contact.title: Get in Touch with Atik Import Export
Contact.description: Need international transportation, truck-based solutions, or information about our upcoming cleaning and care products? Our team and international contacts are ready to help.

Testimonial.title: Trusted by Businesses in Trade and Transportation
Testimonial.description: Hear from our clients who trust Atik Import Export for their critical international trade and transportation needs.

testimonial-1.text: Atik Import Export has been a dependable partner in our daily logistics operations. Their attention to detail and timely deliveries consistently exceed expectations. It's clear they prioritize reliability and service.

testimonial-2.text: We've worked with several logistics firms, but none have matched the professionalism of Atik. Their team is responsive, organized, and always ready with a solution when challenges arise.

testimonial-3.text: International shipping can be complex. Atik makes it straightforward. From customs handling to final delivery, everything runs smoothly and transparently. A team you can count on.

AboutUs.aboutUsText: Atik Import Export connects global markets through reliable trade partnerships, high-quality products, and efficient logistics. We build lasting connections that drive growth and success across Europe and the Middle East.
AboutUs.subDescription: We focus on excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction. Atik Import Export turns opportunities into results. We specialize in international transportation of cleaning and care products. We're preparing our full range of these products for global distribution.

Hero.imageAlt: Global trade concept with containers, trucks, and product images representing cleaning and care items

Services.headline: International Trade & Transportation Solutions
Services.description: Atik Import Export provides international transportation for cleaning and care products, reliable truck-based solutions, and will soon distribute a full range of high-quality cleaning and care products.

freight-forwarding.name: International Transportation
freight-forwarding.description: Atik Import Export specializes in the international transportation of cleaning and care products. We deliver your goods safely and on time, all around the world.
freight-forwarding.altText: Cargo containers being loaded onto a ship with Atik Import Export branding

warehousing.name: Secure Storage Solutions
warehousing.description: Safe and efficient storage options that complement our transportation services. Your cleaning and care products stay in good condition.
warehousing.altText: Neatly organized warehouse storing various packaged products

track-shipment.name: Shipment Updates
track-shipment.description: Get real-time updates on your shipments. Full transparency throughout the transportation process.
track-shipment.altText: Digital interface showing a map with shipment tracking points

customs-brokerage.name: Customs Facilitation
customs-brokerage.description: Expert help with customs documentation and procedures. We ensure timely international trade operations.
customs-brokerage.altText: Official documents and stamps related to international customs

project-cargo.name: Truck Transportation
project-cargo.description: With our truck-based transportation services, we carry your cargo safely, quickly, and cost-effectively to its destination. Our modern fleet and experienced team are always at your service.
project-cargo.altText: Atik Import Export branded truck driving on a scenic route

Services.ctaDescription: Every business is unique. Let's discuss how we can adapt our services to meet your needs.

Team.description: Our experienced team follows Atik Import Export's core values of trust and hard work. We ensure every partnership is valuable and every trade runs smoothly.

Summary.title: Building Global Bridges, Delivering Excellence
Summary.description: Atik Import Export specializes in international transportation and will soon distribute high-quality cleaning and care products. We connect businesses worldwide with reliable, secure, and efficient solutions that drive growth.

fast-and-reliable.title: Reliable & Efficient
fast-and-reliable.description: Safe and timely delivery worldwide. Your goods reach their destination on time and in good condition.

specialized-expertise.title: Industry Expertise
specialized-expertise.description: We specialize in international trade and transportation of cleaning and care products.

trust-and-security.title: Trust & Excellence
trust-and-security.description: We deliver on our promises with dedication and precision for every partnership.

customer-centric.title: Partnership Success
customer-centric.description: We focus on excellence and help our clients and partners grow worldwide.

FeatureAccordion.title: Why Partner with Atik Import Export?
FeatureAccordion.description: We offer international transportation, reliable truck-based solutions, and will soon provide direct access to high-quality cleaning and care products. Trust and customer satisfaction guide everything we do.

international-logistics.title: International Transportation
international-logistics.content: Global transportation services. We specialize in safe and timely delivery of cleaning and care products worldwide.

truck-transportation.title: Truck Transportation
truck-transportation.content: Our modern fleet and experienced team ensure your cargo is transported safely, quickly, and cost-effectively to its destination.

distribution.title: Product Distribution (Coming Soon)
distribution.content: Explore our full range of high-quality cleaning and care products. We source and deliver with a commitment to excellence.

partnership-and-growth.title: Partnership & Growth
partnership-and-growth.content: We build strong, reliable, and lasting trade connections. We help our clients grow internationally and succeed long-term.

Stats.title: Global Trade Excellence
Stats.description: Delivering value through our logistics solutions

LogoCloud.title: Trusted by Global Brands
LogoCloud.description: We proudly transport and manage logistics for leading global brands, ensuring their products reach markets safely and on time.

Story.title: Our Foundation: Trust and Hard Work

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Learn more about Atik Import Export, our mission to connect global markets, and our commitment to trust and excellence in international trade.

AboutUsPage.title: About Atik Import Export
AboutUsPage.subtitle: Connecting global trade with trust and reliable logistics solutions.
AboutUsPage.ourStoryText: Founded in Istanbul, Atik Import Export has become a trusted partner for businesses across Europe and the Middle East. We started with a vision to connect markets and deliver quality products reliably. Today, we continue expanding, connecting clients with opportunities worldwide.
AboutUsPage.missionText: We provide efficient, transparent, and customer-focused international trade and transportation services. We specialize in cleaning and care products. We build lasting partnerships and help our clients grow.
AboutUsPage.value1: Integrity and trust in every transaction.
AboutUsPage.value2: Continuous improvement in everything we do.
AboutUsPage.value3: Customer success as our top priority.
AboutUsPage.subDescription: We focus on excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction. Atik Import Export turns opportunities into results. We specialize in international transportation of cleaning and care products. We're preparing our full range of these products for distribution.

About3.breakoutTitle: Your Trusted Partner in Global Trade
About3.breakoutDescription: We provide solutions for international transportation and product distribution. We help your business thrive in a competitive market.
About3.mainImageAlt: Modern logistics hub with containers and trucks
About3.secondaryImageAlt: Efficient cargo handling at a global port
About3.title: Who We Are
About3.description: Atik Import Export connects global markets with reliable logistics and effective solutions. We focus on customer success. Our expertise in international trade and transportation helps businesses grow beyond borders.

meta.title: Services
meta.description: Explore our services including international transportation, warehousing, customs brokerage, and distribution of cleaning and care products.

meta.title: Contact Us
meta.description: Get in touch with Atik Import Export for inquiries about international transportation, logistics solutions, or our product range.

meta.title: Our Brands
meta.description: Discover the trusted brands represented by Atik Import Export. We work with leading brands in cleaning, care, and consumer products.
meta.keywords: Atik Import Export brands, cleaning products brands, care products brands, consumer products, import export brands, logistics brands

BrandsPage.title: Trusted Brands We Represent
BrandsPage.description: We partner with leading global brands in cleaning, care, and consumer products. Each brand represents our commitment to quality and excellence in international trade.
BrandsPage.footerText: These brands trust Atik Import Export for their international transportation and distribution needs.

Distributor.title: BlueSun - Manufacturing Partner
Distributor.description: As our key partner, BlueSun produces for leading global brands while also creating its own proprietary lines. Together, we combine strong manufacturing expertise with a deep understanding of consumer needs to deliver outstanding results.

meta.title: Home
meta.description: Atik Import Export connects global markets through reliable international transportation and specialized solutions for cleaning and care products.
